item.title: %duiker & %serval: bittorrent on Urbit
item.description: %duiker/%serval is a spanking-new software suite for running an Urbit-native bittorrent tracker, developed by ~palfun-foslup with ~paldev. (Astute readers may note the sly references.) This is both a tracker and a command line interface for users to post and retrieve magnet links, which hooks into Urbit’s identity system, and is written in a combined ~1,400(!) lines of Hoon, the Urbit system programming language. Note that this is not a client for downloading torrents; think of it like a torrent site you can only access through your dojo.
